Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will significantly enhance your endeavors and bring substantial value to your business. After careful consideration, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product at a price of $1,350,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the unique benefits it offers to someone like yourself who can fully appreciate its potential. I trust that this proposal will be favorable to you, allowing us to collaborate on a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
